author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The Dwarf enthusiasts over at GRIMSKALD have got retail copies of all their physical assets for their Dungeon Crawler; TORCH & SHIELD. Previously I reviewed this on the Indie Hour in digital but now that it's out in the wild I was lucky enough to get my hands on a copy. Let's check them out. 

Big thanks to GRIMSKALD for the Complimentary copy of the box to review. 

Check out the kits HERE: https://www.grimskald.com/category/torch-shield

Click up in the Cards for the Indie Hour feature on the full rules!

Music "Retrofuture Nasty" by Kevin McLeod used via Creative Commons
title: GMG Reviews - TORCH & SHIELD by GRIMSKALD
